works.description:
I had previously reported that "many blog
 
posts of my blog here at http://www.bloggertricks.biz were infringed by
the  
text excerpted on the site http://faduhack.blogspot.in and i was pleased
to  
see the infringed posts being take down by Blogger team". But the guy here
 
at http://faduhack.blogspot.in is again and again copying my blog posts  
from my blog here at http://bloggertricks.biz and these second time  
infringed blog posts was already reported by me to Google and it had been 

removed due to copyright infringement.
